title: Cooma: gateway to the Snowy Mountains
creator_credit: Cooma Municipal Council and George I. Malcolm
brief_description: Shows the tourist attractions of Cooma in New South Wales. Includes fishing for trout, hiking, the scenic Snowy Mountains, hydro-electric undertakings, and the wonderful snow fields within easy reach of the town.
creator_credit_for_label: Cooma Municipal Council and George I. Malcolm
